description: Mersenne numbers with at most 2 prime factors.
references: J. Brillhart et al., Factorizations of b^n +- 1. Contemporary Mathematics, Vol. 22, Amer. Math. Soc., Providence, RI, 2nd edition, 1985; and later supplements.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: J. Brillhart et al., Factorizations of b^n +- 1, Contemporary Mathematics, Vol. 22, Amer. Math. Soc., Providence, RI, 3rd edition, 2002.
S. S. Wagstaff, Jr., The Cunningham Project
maple: A006515 := proc(n) local i;i := 2^(ithprime(n))-1:if (nops(numtheory[factorset](i)) < 3) then   return ifi: end: seq(A006515(n), n=1..19);
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
